page.title: 02SHOPPING
page.content: When our mums and dads go shopping the shops they go to depend on the area where we live and what they need. In Llanrymney there are shops in Countisbury Avenue and Ball Road.Most of them sell fruits and veg,meat or newspapers.At the top of Rumney hill, the shops include a Bicycle shop, Opticians and a clothes shop. In Llanedeyrn many people go to the Maelfa,a large shopping centre.Here there are two supermarkets as well as grocers butchers and clothes shops and an optician.There is a much smaller shopping centre in Pentwyn. Most of the time,our parents go to one of the big supermarkets,that are fairly near.Sainsburys have two supermarkets nearby.One at Thornhill, the other in Colchester Avenue.Tesco in St.Mellons is also well used,and they provide a bus service for users.
